terms.definition: Our Notation: k | KA: ಕ್ | IPA: k
Our Notation: ng | KA: ಙ್ | IPA: ŋ
Our Notation: c | KA: ಚ್ | IPA: s
Our Notation: nj | KA: ಞ್ | IPA: ɲ
Our Notation: t | KA: ಟ್ | IPA: ʈ
terms.description: like 't' in stable, but with the tongue retracted

terms.definition: Our Notation: N | KA: ಣ್ | IPA: ɳ
terms.description: similar to 'n' in not, but with the tongue retracted

terms.definition: Our Notation: th | KA: ತ್ | IPA: t̪
Our Notation: n | KA: ನ್ | IPA: n
terms.description: similar to 'n' in net, but with the tongue touching the back of the front teeth

terms.definition: Our Notation: p | KA: ಪ್  | IPA: p
Our Notation: m | KA: ಮ್  | IPA: m
Our Notation: y | KA: ಯ್ | IPA: j
Our Notation: r | KA: ರ್ | IPA: r
Our Notation: l | KA: ಲ್ | IPA: l
terms.description: similar to 'l' in let, but with the tongue touching the back of the front teeth

terms.definition: Our Notation: v | KA: ವ್ | IPA: ʋ
terms.description: between w and v; Dutch wang

terms.definition: Our Notation: L | KA: ಳ್ | IPA: ɭ
terms.description: similar to 'l' in let, but with the tongue retracted

terms.definition: Our Notation: zh | KA: approximated to ಳ್ | IPA: ɻ
terms.description: like 'r' in rotten, but with the tongue retracted

terms.definition: Our Notation: R | KA: approximated to ರ್ | IPA: r
Our Notation: nn | KA: approximated to ಣ್ | IPA: n
